summary: This is an internal email chain from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) dated June 25, 2019, forwarding a news article about a hearing in the Jeffrey Epstein case. The email discusses circulating legal papers and references a Miami Herald article covering the hearing.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: Recipient of an internal email forwarding a news article about an Epstein hearing. He is the U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Epstein Hearing
events.description: A hearing in the Jeffrey Epstein case, covered by the Miami Herald. The email forwards a link to the article about this hearing.

keyFacts: Internal SDNY email correspondence from June 25, 2019, discusses the Epstein case.
References a Miami Herald article covering an Epstein hearing that occurred around June 24, 2019.
Shows internal coordination within the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the case, including a request to circulate legal papers.
Geoffrey Berman, then U.S. Attorney for SDNY, is a recipient of the email.
